Name: Angler's Life
About the game: Angler's Life Try out yourself as a Fisherman! Now you can experience, how it feels like to become an early-bird for the hope of better bite. To work hard for the newer and newer fishing equipment, but don't forget to take care of yourself! If you don't feel like fishing, that's no problem, install spare rods, arrange your house, or just walk around the city. You can find so many other possibilities to have fun. Run out of money? Break into a pond and fish freely, but watch out for not to be caught! Continuously expanding content. Continuously expanding fish species The Angler's Life awaits you!
